media.description: When idea becomes mainstream with significant media coverage

iv.description: Implied volatility spike indicates market awareness

price.description: Price has captured majority of expected move

full_exit.action: Exit full position, edge has dissipated

framing.summary: Probability-decay framing: weighted_sum is a proxy for parity risk, not a deterministic signal count.
framing.interpretation: As weighted_sum rises, odds increase that the market has learned the thesis and edge decays.

pdufa_iv_multiples.note: Use as guidance alongside media/price signals; do not auto-exit on IV alone.

activist_media_timing.note: Treat multiple mainstream cycles after day 20 as parity; outcome coverage carries the most weight.

cockroach_rule.principle: First cockroach predicts 62% probability of second; after second, 91% probability of third (terminal)

implementation: Move stop loss to break-even on remainder

post_second_cockroach.note: After two distinct negative events, exit regardless of severity classification

MINOR: 3-month extension for labeling/REMS discussions (78% approval rate)
MODERATE: 3-month extension for additional data analysis (25% approval rate)
Mixed Phase 3 data (one trial hit, one miss)
MAJOR: Negative AdCom vote (10% commercial success rate)

MINOR: Second Request issued (HSR) - 85% close rate in isolation
State AG inquiry without federal involvement
MODERATE: Spread widens >200bp with no public news (leakage signal)
Phase 2 investigation opened (UK CMA or EU Commission)
MAJOR: DOJ/FTC lawsuit filed to block (<20% close rate)
Acquirer board dissent or CEO change

MINOR: Activist trims stake <5% with continued vocal support
MODERATE: Activist loses proxy vote but gains minority board seats
Settlement reached with limited governance changes
MAJOR: Standstill agreement with no board seats or strategic review
Company successfully defends with no concessions

MINOR: Spin date delayed <30 days for administrative reasons
MODERATE: Debt allocation changed unfavorably to SpinCo
MAJOR: Spin cancelled or converted to sale process

MINOR: Single insider sells (not part of original cluster)
MODERATE: Earnings miss within 60 days of cluster

MAJOR: Bankruptcy conversion (Chapter 7 to 11 or vice versa)

MINOR: Amendment proposed that doesn't affect thesis

false_positive_indicators.description: Signals that a cockroach may be recoverable (reduces exit urgency for MINOR/MODERATE)
indicators: Immediate insider buying following the event
false_positive_indicators.note: False positive indicators do NOT override MAJOR classification - those are always immediate exits

backtest_validation.note: Graduated approach captures recoveries from MINOR events while protecting capital on MAJOR events

finerman_corollary.rationale: Don't rationalize holding a broken thesis

ma_200.rationale: Long-term trend has turned, tighten stops

thesis_break.rationale: When reason for holding changes, exit immediately

activist_warn_filing.trigger: WARN Act filing with 'loss of contract' language
activist_warn_filing.rationale: Loss of major contract invalidates activist thesis (operational fix unlikely)
activist_warn_filing.implementation: Monitor state WARN Act databases for company. Parse filing text for contract loss language. If detected, trigger immediate exit.

note: Check hard exits BEFORE info parity. Hard exits override all other considerations.

options_adjustments.overview: Options positions use LOWER info parity thresholds due to theta decay penalty

info_parity_thresholds.rationale: Theta decay makes holding riskier - exit earlier than equity (vs 2.0/3.0)

approaching_expiration.rationale: Avoid expiration week gamma risk and accelerating theta

expiration_warning.rationale: Give advance notice to plan close or roll

catalyst_passed.trigger: Catalyst date has occurred and position still open
catalyst_passed.rationale: Binary catalysts are the thesis - exit once resolved, don't speculate on post-catalyst move

iv_crush_post_catalyst.action: EXIT immediately if not already closed
iv_crush_post_catalyst.rationale: IV crush eliminates option value even if stock moved favorably

pdufa.rationale: FDA decisions cause immediate IV crush - exit same day to capture value
pdufa.exception: If approval + stock hasn't moved yet, consider holding 1-2 hours
pdufa.iv_multiple_guidance: Monitor 2.0x, partial 2.5x, full near 3.0x; use with time-to-catalyst context.

activist.settlement_exit: Exit 50% on settlement announcement, let remainder run
activist.leaps_rollout: Consider rolling LEAPS if 60+ DTE remain and campaign progressing
activist.standstill_exit: Full exit if standstill agreement reached (campaign over)

merger_arb.deal_close_exit: Exit immediately on deal close announcement (spreads compress)
merger_arb.deal_break_exit: Full exit on any cockroach or deal wobble (higher downside risk)

insider.volume_surge_exit: If volume surged post-entry and stock moved, take profits
insider.90_day_rule: If no volume surge within 90 days of cluster, exit or roll
